name: Lumenary
long_description:
Lumenary accelerates financial research with advanced AI. Our software automates multi-step AI workflows and over complex financial documents. 

Lumenary was founded by four best friends who met at Dartmouth College, with engineering and financial expertise from Jane Street Capital, IMC Trading, Palantir Technologies, and Blackstone. 

They've published high impact machine learning research in venues like NeurIPS, in addition to deploying secure enterprise software managing billions of dollars and petabytes of data.
one_liner: AI-powered research for financial service professionals.
